markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Traitorous Thoughts](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2297)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you hold this sleek, shiny gray wand, you hear a faint chorus of overlapping whispers.

<document level="2" id="action-1846" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _mind probe_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of Traitorous Thoughts
